name: Clima
description:
My first try at building an RTS. 

This is my second game, and first gam jam, which took place over 48 hours. Certainly there is much to be improved on but I'm happy with what I was able to complete. I used Godot 4, Aseprite, and Kenney's asset packs.

The project is open-source and files can be found here: https://github.com/peytondwilliams/clima
